review based on a complete playtrough that took 55 hours on normal difficulty  definitely got my moneys worth from the wasteland 3 experience well written extremely well voice acted and a really feeling of progression with gearing up not too over the top the only disappointment was the final boss battle was pretty trivial compared to some of the other boss fights  definitely have the urge to replay with different builds and different choices  recommended

one of the great rpgs really lets you be part of the world they created while etching out a chunk of it for yourself tough decisions with more consequences than you can initially see fun turn based combat and an interesting story that keeps you hooked till the end i definitely recommend it to anyone who like turn based rpgs

simply put one of the best games ive ever played the writing is so good in this game it makes baldurs gate 3 look like ai slop the combat is clean and easy to read where many games within the genre try to punish the player by making hitboxes and environmental details obscure wasteland 3 was clearly designed by developers who actually play video games  this is a mustbuy for anyone who enjoys postapocalyptic storytelling or turnbased grid combat
